domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text:
Breaking: AusGov assert that the *magic* that prohibits covid19 spreading in classrooms, pubs & restaurants, footy & protests regarding 5G conspiracy theories do NOT apply at gatherings where Aboriginal people or their rights are being represented. 
#blacklivesmatteraustralia
